summary: This document is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York Public Affairs office, forwarding a New York Post article link about Jeffrey Epstein signing a will two days before his death. It serves as internal communication regarding media coverage of the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker
persons.context: Subject of the forwarded New York Post article about signing a will two days before his suicide.

events.title: Epstein signs will
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein signed a will two days before his death, as reported in a New York Post article.

events.title: Epstein's death
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide in his jail cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office forwarding a media link.
It references a New York Post article dated August 19, 2019, about Jeffrey Epstein's will.
The article reports Epstein signed his will two days before his death on August 10, 2019.
The email demonstrates the office monitoring media coverage related to the Epstein case.
The document ID EFTA00105246 suggests it is part of a larger document set released in the case.
